column1: Master Degree in Finance and Insurance (LM-16)
column5: The Master in Finance and Insurance (Laurea Magistrale) offers high-quality education in the areas of finance, insurance and economics with state-of-the-art quantitative methods and applications to the world of business, which makes it unique in Italy. In particular, the programme provides students with in-depth knowledge for the design and management of complex financial and insurance products, for understanding the organization of financial markets, for the definition and management of social security systems and to measure risks relating to individual financial and insurance products.  What You Will StudyThis is a full-time 2-year course with a two-semester system per academic year. Starting date – End September.
